heading: HB05256
0: AN ACT UPGRADING THE PHILIPPINE OVERSEAS EMPLOYMENT ADMINISTRATION INTO DEPARTMENT OF OVERSEAS FILIPINOS, REVISING AND CONSOLIDATING FOR THE PURPOSE EXECUTIVE ORDER NO. 247, SERIES OF 1987, SECTIONS 2, 3, 19, 23(b) and (b1) OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8042, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE MIGRANT WORKERS AND OVERSEAS FILIPINOS ACT OF 1995, AS AMENDED BY REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9422, REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10022 AND REPUBLIC ACT NO. 11299, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
